content.rendered:
Thursday’s Kids’ Corner

Join us on Thursday, July 20th, for Kids’ Corner at our Warner Robins location. Our special guest this Thursday will be Rigby’s Entertainment Complex! Events will start promptly at 10:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. We will have a reading, juice/drinks, and giveaways!

 

Friday’s Kids’ Corner

On Friday, July 21st, we will have a Kids’ Corner at our Macon location. We will be reading about ants! Each child will receive a FREE 9″ PLUSH ANT (while quantities last)! Juice/water will be provided, and there’s no purchase necessary.

 

Perry Store

We are renovating our Perry store! To do this, we will have to close that store down for the month of August. However, our other three locations will be open for business.

excerpt.rendered: Join us on Thursday, July 20th, for Kids’ Corner at our Warner Robins location. Our special guest this Thursday will be Rigby’s Entertainment Complex!
